brand_info.name: Mizuno
brand_info.positioning: Performance sports brand rooted in Japanese craftsmanship and engineering, focused on biomechanics-driven innovation across running, team sports, and equipment.
brand_info.vision: To contribute to society through the advancement of sporting goods and the promotion of sports.
brand_info.mission: To develop high-quality sports products through craftsmanship, innovation, and science, enabling athletes to reach beyond their limits.
brand_info.origin_story: Founded in 1906 in Osaka, Japan by Rihachi Mizuno and Rizo Mizuno as a sporting goods shop, later evolving into a global performance brand known for technical footwear, apparel, and equipment.

brand_values.brand_promise: Precision-engineered sports products that balance performance, durability, and comfort through disciplined Japanese craftsmanship.
differentiators: Japanese manufacturing philosophy and attention to detail
Biomechanics-driven product development and Wave technology
Credibility across multiple sports including running, baseball, volleyball, and golf
non_negotiables: Respect for athlete movement and biomechanics

psychographics.lifestyle: Athletes who value discipline, technique, and long-term progression through consistent training
psychographics.behavior: Chooses products based on fit, feel, and proven technology; shows loyalty to trusted franchises; values expert recommendations

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Fact-based and performance-led with calm confidence and minimal exaggeration

logo.primary_logo: Mizuno RunBird symbol paired with Mizuno wordmark
logo.usage_rules: Maintain clarity and proportion; never distort or decorate; ensure strong contrast
logo.lockup_behavior: Often used as an end-card or discreet corner mark; balanced and disciplined placement
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals the height of the Mizuno wordmark

color_system.color_usage_rules: Cool, technical palette communicating trust and precision; accent colors appear mainly on product

preferred_photographers: Varies by sport; consistent performance-oriented visual language
style.camera_feel: Controlled realism emphasizing technique and form
style.pose_guidelines: Sport-specific movement; efficient posture; moments of control and power

technical.lighting: Natural daylight or clean directional studio light
technical.depth_of_field: Medium to shallow to isolate athlete and product
technical.color_grading: Neutral, cool-balanced tones with accurate material rendering

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Key technologies, fit, and material behavior must be clearly readable

motion_rules.transitions: Clean cuts with occasional slow motion to highlight mechanics

digital.tone_adjustment: More technical and educational online; restrained motivational cues on social

platform_behavior.Instagram: Technique-focused action, athlete details, clean compositions
platform_behavior.Website: Technology-led product pages with clear explanations and fit guidance
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Product innovation updates, athlete insights, sport-specific education

print.paper: Clean commercial stock with neutral finish
print.cover_rules: Athlete or product detail with minimal copy and disciplined layout

logo_misuse_examples: Decorative effects applied to the logo
